name: Till It Bloom
description:
The upgrade system is random but fair enuogh to not make you lose.

Gun: you can upgrade your current Gun damage or Change it to next tire.

Tree: you can Grow you tree to next tire or buy prograss to fast it.

Health: you can maximize your health or heal (Depends on what card you get).

Each card cost you points so make sure to spend it well, also the first reroll is free after that it cost 3 points multiplied by reroll count.

Note:

This game had a plan to have abilities and buildings and more upgrades and different system for the tree growth.

also there was 2 more enemies.

but cause time i couldn't implement all of this and had to simplify it to this. so after the jam end i will update the game state to the new system.

And if the game got enough support i will keep developing it and create a support for android.

Have Fun :)
